content:
Sure, here's an updated version of Christina Hyde's resume with the additional information you provided:

---

CHRISTINA HYDE
6445 S Minerva Ave Unit 1 Chicago IL 60637 | (773)957-5951© | [chyde25@gmail.com](mailto:chyde25@gmail.com)

PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY

Results-driven Customer Service Trainer with 8 years of experience in training development and project management. Well organized, purposeful, and detailed customer care professional with healthcare expertise in call center operations. Extremely ambitious with the ability to multi-task, adapt to any environment, and learn new processes.

SKILLS

* Training development and delivery
* Project management
* Needs analysis
* Sales strategies
* Systems training
* Customer service skills
* New product and services training
* Supervisory and diversity training
* Compliance training
* Small business training
* Call center operations management
* Workflow management
* Relationship building
* Mentoring and coaching
* Team building and leadership

CERTIFICATIONS

* Customer Service Professional Certification, HDI
* Certified Associate in Project Management (CAPM), Project Management Institute

EXPERIENCE

01/22 - Present

Allstate Apprentice - AskHR, Allstate Insurance Company

* Provide customer service support to Allstate employees and their families
* Answer employee inquiries related to HR policies, benefits, payroll, and other HR-related matters
* Assist with HR processes and transactions in Workday, including employee data changes and employment verifications
* Participate in AskHR team projects to improve processes and enhance customer experience
* Recognized by leadership for achieving a 100% satisfaction score in February 2023
* Participated in panel for OMD boards and involved in Employee Resource Groups (ERGs)

08/16- 03/20

02/15-03/16 Training and Development Specialist, Harris & Harris

11/08-12/14 Trainer/Supervisor, Informis Health Solutions

EDUCATION

08/20- Present Kennedy King College –Still Attending Accounting Associates
